subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ふな|フナ}}

# [[crucian carp]], any [[fish]] of the genus ''[[Carassius]]''

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|寒鮒|かんぶな}}: [[crucian carp]] caught in [[mid-winter]]
* {{ja-r|ギベリオ鮒|ギベリオぶな}}: {{vern|Prussian carp}} ({{taxlink|Carassius gibelio|species|ver=170615}})
* {{ja-r|源五郎鮒|げんごろうぶな}}: [[Japanese crucian carp]] (''[[Carassius cuvieri]]'')
* {{ja-r|朝鮮鮒|ちょうせんぶな}}: {{vern|round-tailed paradise fish}} ({{taxlink|Macropodus ocellatus|species|ver=170615}})
* {{ja-r|煮頃鮒|にごろぶな}}: [[nigorobuna]] (''[[Carassius auratus grandoculis]]'')
* {{ja-r|鮒寿司|ふなずし}}: [[funazushi]]
* {{ja-r|ヨーロッパ鮒|ヨーロッパぶな}}: [[crucian carp]], ''[[Carassius carassius]]''
{{der-bottom}}
